Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Major).description: If you choose to Demoralize, you gain a +4 item bonus to the Intimidation check.
Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Major).name: Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Major)

Effect: Aromatic Ammunition.description: The components of this ammunition emit a strong smell when combined during its activation. A creature hit by an activated aromatic ammunition gains a distinct odor for up to 1 hour or until the scent is washed off (requiring at least a gallon of water and 10 minutes of scrubbing). Any creatures within 30 feet smell the target, allowing even those with a weak sense of smell to detect its presence, and all creatures gain a +1 item bonus to Track the affected creature for as long as it has the odor. A creature that has imprecise or precise scent doubles the range at which they can detect the target using their scent compared to the normal range of their scent.
Effect: Aromatic Ammunition.name: Effect: Aromatic Ammunition

Effect: Nosoi Charm (Greater) (Lifesense.description: You gain lifesense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet as long as you are holding the charm, and do not need to activate it. This allows you to sense the life force that animates living creatures and the perverse force that animates the dead, though you can't distinguish between the two.
Effect: Nosoi Charm (Greater) (Lifesense.name: Effect: Nosoi Charm (Greater) (Lifesense)

Effect: Dragon's Blood Pudding (Moderate.description: If you choose to Demoralize, you gain a +2 item bonus to the Intimidation check.

Effect: Rowan Rifle (Cold).name: Effect: Rowan Rifle (Cold)

Effect: Raise a Shield.description: You position your shield to protect yourself. When you have Raised a Shield, you gain its listed circumstance bonus to AC. Your shield remains raised until the start of your next turn.
Effect: Raise a Shield.name: Effect: Raise a Shield

Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Moderate).description: After Activating the mask, you also gain a +2 item bonus to Fortitude saves against inhaled effects; this bonus is increased to +3 against the deadly volcanic gas known around Terwa Lake as Dead Man's Breath, and possibly against other similar volcanic gases at the GM's discretion.
Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Moderate).name: Effect: Red-Rib Gill Mask (Moderate)

Effect: Glittering Snare (Failure).description: The creature takes a -2 status penalty to Stealth checks for 2 minutes or until it spends a 2-action activity, which has the manipulate trait, to remove the glitter. If the creature was @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, the glitter outlines it for 1 round, making it @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} rather than @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to visual senses.
Effect: Glittering Snare (Failure).name: Effect: Glittering Snare (Failure)

Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb.description:
This lightweight mesh fits easily over light armor. The suit is designed to incorporate local flora and ground clutter into the mesh to help you blend in seamlessly with the environment. Due to the abrasive nature of the materials used, this item is unsuitable for use by unarmored characters. You can prepare the suit for use within your current environment by using an exploration activity that takes at least 10 minutes, but sometimes longer if the materials are hard to find or the environment is unusual enough to warrant additional difficulty in preparing camouflage that can blend with it consistently.

A superb camouflage suit is fashioned from especially well-blended materials grants you a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks while you attempt to Hide or Sneak in the specific environment it has been prepared for. The suit remains usable in this manner until you rest for the night, though it doesn't grant the benefit whenever you aren't in the appropriate environment. The GM might rule that some environments are unusual enough that you can't create a camouflage suit appropriate for the environment.
Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb.name: Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit (Superb)

Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Greater).description: The plating grants the wearer of the armor the 20 Hit Points for 1 hour or until lost. Removing the plating early destroys it.

The glitter continues to fall around the creature until completely removed, leaving a trail behind it as it moves and revealing its rough location; the creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, rather than @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}, to any creature that can see the glitter whenever it would otherwise have been undetected.

Effect: Arboreal's Revenge (Speed Penalt.description: The targets take a -10-foot circumstance penalty to their Speeds as roots rapidly sprout from their wounds, which lasts until they @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} (DC 20).

Cover.description: When you're behind an obstacle that could block weapons, guard you against explosions, and make you harder to detect, you're behind cover. Standard cover gives you a +2 circumstance bonus to AC, to Reflex saves against area effects, and to Stealth checks to Hide, Sneak, or otherwise avoid detection. You can increase this to greater cover using the Take Cover basic action, increasing the circumstance bonus to +4. If cover is especially light, typically when it's provided by a creature, you have lesser cover, which grants a +1 circumstance bonus to AC. A creature with standard cover or greater cover can attempt to use Stealth to Hide, but lesser cover isn't sufficient.
Cover.name: Cover

Effect: Cape of the Open Sky.description: The cape becomes a pair of golden drake wings that grant you a fly Speed of 30 feet for 1 hour.
Effect: Cape of the Open Sky.name: Effect: Cape of the Open Sky

Effect: Wand of Fey Flames.description: For the duration of the spell, you can use the limning flames as a source for your magic. Creatures affected by your faerie fire must succeed at a Will save against your spell DC or take a -2 status penalty to their Will saves against enchantment and illusions spells as long as they are affected by faerie fire. You can cast an enchantment or illusion spell on such a creature up to a distance twice the spell's normal range. If the spell has a range of touch, or doesn't have a range, it is unaffected by the increase in range from the faerie fire.
Effect: Wand of Fey Flames.name: Effect: Wand of Fey Flames

Effect: Nosoi Charm (Lifesense).description: You gain lifesense as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet for 1 hour as long as you continue to hold the charm. This allows you to sense the life force that animates living creatures and the perverse force that animates the dead, though you can't distinguish between the two.
Effect: Nosoi Charm (Lifesense).name: Effect: Nosoi Charm (Lifesense)

Effect: Fire and Iceberg (Greater).description: You gain resistance 10 to fire and cold for 5 minutes.
Effect: Fire and Iceberg (Greater).name: Effect: Fire and Iceberg (Greater)

Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.skBa6D1uxb0b2USn]{Slippers of Spider Climbing}

Automatically applied effects:

  • Gain a 20-foot climb Speed
Effect: Slippers of Spider Climbing.name: Effect: Slippers of Spider Climbing

Effect: Greater Potion of Stable Form.description: For the next hour, you gain a +3 item bonus against transmutation effects, which is +4 against polymorph effects. If you roll a success against a polymorph effect during that time, you get a critical success instead.
Effect: Greater Potion of Stable Form.name: Effect: Greater Potion of Stable Form

Equipment Effect: Orchestral Brooch.description: You receive a +1 status bonus to your Performance check. If you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.
Equipment Effect: Orchestral Brooch.name: Equipment Effect: Orchestral Brooch

Effect: Demon Dust (Stage 1).description: The creature gains a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks

Granted by activating @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.rXXNw6dwVn96giDi]{Goggles of Night (Major)}

You gain greater darkvision, which lasts until you rotate the lenses back or the item is no longer invested by you, whicever comes first.
Effect: Goggles of Night (Major).name: Effect: Goggles of Night (Major)

Effect: Ivory Baton.description: The construct gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws (except saving throws against the ivory baton).
Effect: Ivory Baton.name: Effect: Ivory Baton

Effect: Taljjae's Mask (The General).description: The General grants its wearer a +3 status bonus to attack rolls with polearms for 1 minute.

Effect: Demon Dust (Stage 2).description: The creature gains a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks
Effect: Demon Dust (Stage 2).name: Effect: Demon Dust (Stage 2)

Effect: Greater Fanged Rune Animal Form.description:
You transform into a Small or Medium animal that wields the fanged weapon in its jaws; the animal matches the animal you are most closely associated with (a lizardfolk would turn into a lizard, a kitsune into a fox, a deer instinct barbarian into a deer, etc.) or a wolf if no specific animal is applicable. While in this form, you can attack with the fanged weapon even though you don't have any hands. However, you can attack only with the fanged weapon and you don't have hands or the ability to hold items. For effects dependent on how many hands you are using to hold the item, such as the two-hand trait, you are holding the weapon in two hands. You can Dismiss this effect, and it ends automatically if you drop the fanged weapon (whether or not of your own volition).

In animal form, you gain low-light vision and a +5-foot item bonus to your Speed.
Effect: Greater Fanged Rune Animal Form.source: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
Effect: Greater Fanged Rune Animal Form.name: Effect: Greater Fanged Rune Animal Form

Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Greater).description: When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed of 20 feet and a +2 item bonus to athletics checks made to climb for 10 minutes.
Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Greater).name: Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Greater)

Effect: Greater Five-Feather Wreath.description: You gain a +1 item bonus to Acrobatics checks and resistance 5 to falling damage.

A tanglefoot bag is filled with sticky substances. When you hit a creature with a tanglefoot bag, that creature takes a -15-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute. The Escape DC is 28.

Effect: Suit of Armoire Frustration.description:
On a failure, you and all creatures within 30 feet must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:31] save or be overcome with frustration at how you can't follow the simple, easy-to-understand diagrams for assembling the armoire, imposing a -1 status penalty to Will saves for 1 hour.

Note: This item originates from the 2022 Paizo April Fools Blog post.

You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed until the end of your next turn.

While you have a status bonus to at least one of your Speeds, your Strikes with this scimitar that deal fire damage gain a +2 status bonus to their fire damage. The status bonus increases to +3 if the weapon has a greater striking rune and +4 for major striking.

Note: the base +2 increase to damage is included in this effect. It cannot currently be made to automatically increase.
Equipment Effect: South Wind's Scorch So.name: Equipment Effect: South Wind's Scorch Song (Speed Boost)

Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit.description:
This lightweight mesh fits easily over light armor. The suit is designed to incorporate local flora and ground clutter into the mesh to help you blend in seamlessly with the environment. Due to the abrasive nature of the materials used, this item is unsuitable for use by unarmored characters. You can prepare the suit for use within your current environment by using an exploration activity that takes at least 10 minutes, but sometimes longer if the materials are hard to find or the environment is unusual enough to warrant additional difficulty in preparing camouflage that can blend with it consistently.

A suit prepared in this manner grants you a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks while you attempt to Hide or Sneak in the specific environment it has been prepared for. The suit remains usable in this manner until you rest for the night, though it doesn't grant the benefit whenever you aren't in the appropriate environment. The GM might rule that some environments are unusual enough that you can't create a camouflage suit appropriate for the environment.
Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit.name: Effect: Prepared Camouflage Suit

Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (Lesser).description: The plating grants the wearer of the armor the 5 Hit Points for 1 minute or until lost. Removing the plating early destroys it.

Effect: Major Fanged Rune Animal Form.description:
You transform into a Small or Medium animal that wields the fanged weapon in its jaws; the animal matches the animal you are most closely associated with (a lizardfolk would turn into a lizard, a kitsune into a fox, a deer instinct barbarian into a deer, etc.) or a wolf if no specific animal is applicable. While in this form, you can attack with the fanged weapon even though you don't have any hands. However, you can attack only with the fanged weapon and you don't have hands or the ability to hold items. For effects dependent on how many hands you are using to hold the item, such as the two-hand trait, you are holding the weapon in two hands. Effect: Jack's Tattered Cape.description: You gain a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}.
Effect: Jack's Tattered Cape.name: Effect: Jack's Tattered Cape

Effect: Glittering Snare (Success).description: The creature takes a -1 status penalty to Stealth checks for 1 minute or until it uses an Interact action to remove the glitter.
Effect: Glittering Snare (Success).name: Effect: Glittering Snare (Success)

Effect: Kraken's Guard.description: When you use the shield to Grapple, you gain a +3 item bonus to your Athletics check.
Effect: Kraken's Guard.name: Effect: Kraken's Guard

Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Lesser).description: When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed of 15 feet and a +1 item bonus to athletics checks made to climb for 1 minute.
Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Lesser).name: Effect: Spiderfoot Brew (Lesser)

Effect: Hyldarf's Fang.description: You call upon Hyldarf's power to gain the magic of a linnorm for a brief time. For 1 minute, you gain the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.A2JfEKe6BZcTG1S8]{Fly}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aqRYNoSvxsVfqglH]{Freedom of Movement}, and @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.uqlxMQQeSGWEVjki]{True Seeing} as well as fire resistance 20.
Effect: Hyldarf's Fang.name: Effect: Hyldarf's Fang

Effect: Fire and Iceberg (Major).description: You gain resistance 15 to fire and cold for 10 minutes.
Effect: Fire and Iceberg (Major).name: Effect: Fire and Iceberg (Major)

Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (True).description: The plating grants the wearer of the armor the 40 Hit Points for 1 hour or until lost. Removing the plating early destroys it.
Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (True).name: Effect: Ablative Armor Plating (True)

Effect: Crimson Fulcrum Lens.description: You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against fear effects and a +2 item bonus to your melee Strike damage (this increases to a +4 item bonus to damage if the melee Strike is a jaws attack).
Effect: Crimson Fulcrum Lens.name: Effect: Crimson Fulcrum Lens

Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Arcan.description:
Granted by activating @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.MO8J2IcBhiTnm9D8]{Aeon Stone (Orange Prism)} when the last spell you cast was an Arcane spell.

Automatically applied effects:

  • +2 item bonus to Arcana
Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Arcan.name: Effect: Aeon Stone (Orange Prism) (Arcana)

Effect: Disarm (Success).description: The target takes a -2 circumstance penalty to attacks with the item or other checks requiring a firm grasp on the item.
Effect: Disarm (Success).name: Effect: Disarm (Success)

Equipment Effect: Phoenix Flask.description: For 1 minute, you gain a Fly speed of 40 feet. The first time each round that you Fly (including to hover in place), you shed burning feathers that deal [[/r {3d4}[fire]]]{3d4 fire damage} to all creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] at the end of your movement (@Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true|name:Phoenix Flask Fire Feathers|traits:consumable,evocation,fire,magical,potion|showDC:all] save).
Equipment Effect: Phoenix Flask.name: Equipment Effect: Phoenix Flask

Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 2).description: The creature gains a +2 item bonus to initiative checks.
Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 2).name: Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 2)

Effect: Oath of the Devoted.description:
Activate 1 command

Frequency once per day

Effect You gain a +1 status bonus to Will saves. Choose a weapon or an unarmed Strike; your chosen attack deals an extra [[/r {1d6}[fire]]]{1d6 fire damage} for the next 1 minute.
Effect: Oath of the Devoted.name: Effect: Oath of the Devoted

Effect: Spellguard Blade.description:
Granted by @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.v6LpzpIA0BmKvEtK]{Spellguard Blade}

Automatically applied effects:

  • +1 circumstance bonus to AC
  • +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against spells
Effect: Spellguard Blade.name: Effect: Spellguard Blade
